net.consensys.cava.rlp

Class RLP

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.consensys.cava.rlp.RLP

  • public final class RLP
extends java.lang.Object
    Recursive Length Prefix (RLP) encoding and decoding.

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        public static Bytes encode(java.util.function.Consumer<RLPWriter> fn)
        Encode values to a Bytes value.

        Important: this method does not write any list prefix to the result. If you are writing a RLP encoded list of values, you usually want to use encodeList(Consumer).

        Parameters:
        fn - A consumer that will be provided with a RLPWriter that can consume values.
        Returns:
        The RLP encoding in a Bytes value.

      • encodeList

        public static Bytes encodeList(java.util.function.Consumer<RLPWriter> fn)
        Encode a list of values to a Bytes value.
        Parameters:
        fn - A consumer that will be provided with a RLPWriter that can consume values.
        Returns:
        The RLP encoding in a Bytes value.

      • decode

        public static <T> T decode(Bytes source,
                           java.util.function.Function<RLPReader,T> fn)
        Read and decode RLP from a Bytes value.

        Important: this method does not consume any list prefix from the source data. If you are reading a RLP encoded list of values, you usually want to use decodeList(Bytes, Function).

        Type Parameters:
        T - The result type of the reading function.
        Parameters:
        source - The RLP encoded bytes.
        fn - A function that will be provided a RLPReader.
        Returns:
        The result from the reading function.

      • decodeList

        public static <T> T decodeList(Bytes source,
                               java.util.function.Function<RLPReader,T> fn)
        Read an RLP encoded list of values from a Bytes value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The result type of the reading function.
        Parameters:
        source - The RLP encoded bytes.
        fn - A function that will be provided a RLPReader.
        Returns:
        The result from the reading function.
        Throws:
        InvalidRLPEncodingException - If there is an error decoding the RLP source.
        InvalidRLPTypeException - If the first RLP value is not a list.

      • decodeList

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Object> decodeList(Bytes source,
                                                          java.util.function.BiConsumer<RLPReader,java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> fn)
        Read an RLP encoded list of values from a Bytes value, populating a mutable output list.
        Parameters:
        source - The RLP encoded bytes.
        fn - A function that will be provided a RLPReader.
        Returns:
        The list supplied to fn.
        Throws:
        InvalidRLPEncodingException - If there is an error decoding the RLP source.
        InvalidRLPTypeException - If the first RLP value is not a list.

      • decodeValue

        public static Bytes decodeValue(Bytes source)
        Read an RLP encoded value from a Bytes value.
        Parameters:
        source - The RLP encoded bytes.
        Returns:
        The bytes for the value.
        Throws:
        InvalidRLPEncodingException - If there is an error decoding the RLP source.
        EndOfRLPException - If there are no RLP values to read.

      • decodeInt

        Returns:
        An integer.

        public static boolean isList(Bytes value)
        Check if the Bytes value contains an RLP encoded list.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
